mapper.select: SELECT mc_paper.user_id FROM mc_paper INNER JOIN mc_student ms on mc_paper.user_id = ms.id AND ms.status = 'STATUS_SUBMITTED' INNER JOIN mc_group mg on ms.group_id = mg.id AND mg.user_id = #{value} WHERE mc_paper.score < 25
